rows.label: qev085503_MSG0001
rows.name: Wait, seriously? THIS thing?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085503_MSG0002
rows.name: So you remember it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085503_MSG0003
rows.name:
How could I forget?
This clunker's the first gun they hand enlistees.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085503_MSG0004
rows.name: You really think this'll help?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085503_MSG0005
rows.name:
Yes. And that's why I'm forbidding you
from using any other weapon for now.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085503_MSG0006
rows.name: But this thing is just—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085503_MSG0007
rows.name: Elma chose it for you, Gwin. She must have a reason.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085503_MSG0008
rows.name: R-right. Sorry.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085503_MSG0009
rows.name: Thank you, Colonel. I'll try it out and see how it goes.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085503_MSG0010
rows.name:
Good. In fact, I just got orders for some new missions,
so why don't we go give them a try.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085503_MSG0011
rows.name: Huh? THREE missions?! ...Right this second?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085503_MSG0012
rows.name: Stow the chatter, soldier, and move out![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085503_MSG0013
rows.name: M-ma'am, yes, ma'am![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085503_MSG0014
rows.name: [ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085503_JNK0010
rows.name: Mutter

rows.label: qev085503_SEL0011
rows.name: Comment about what a taskmaster Elma is.

rows.label: qev085503_JNK0020
rows.name: Defend

rows.label: qev085503_SEL0021
rows.name: Say that Elma was too harsh on Gwin.

rows.label: qev085503_MSG0015
rows.name: Yes, Elma is even harsher drill sergeant than Mustache Man![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085503_MSG0016
rows.name:
Ah, this is nothing—
the Colonel had quite the reputation back in the corps.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085503_MSG0017
rows.name:
Hey, there's nothing wrong with tough love.
Some students need an iron fist.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085503_MSG0018
rows.name:
Believe me, this is nothing compared to
how she was back in the day. Hoo boy![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085503_MSG0019
rows.name: I said move your feet, not your mouth![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085503_MSG0020
rows.name: Ma'am, yes, ma'am![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085503_MSG0021
rows.name:
The perfect weapon for me, huh? With Colonel Elma
picking it out, it's got to be pretty amazing.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085503_MSG0022
rows.name:
...Hmm? Is this suit perfect as well? Ha ha ha!
No, this is just for training.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085503_MSG0023
rows.name:
Rest assured, I change into my real gear before doing
any field missions.[ST:wait ]
